title: Migration of total petroleum hydrocarbon and heavy metal contaminants in the soil–groundwater interface of a petrochemical site using machine learning: impacts of convection and diffusion
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32304-32313
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06060A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yingdong Wu, Jiang Yu, Zhi Huang, Yinying Jiang, Zixin Zeng, Lei Han, Siwei Deng, Jie Yu
Convection and diffusion are key pathways for the migration of total petroleum hydrocarbons (TPH) and heavy metals (HMs) from soil to groundwater.
